title: Physical Security Penetration Test
description: A penetration tester is tasked with gaining unauthorized physical access to a corporate office building to test security controls.

tasks.description: Conduct reconnaissance on the building to identify potential weaknesses like unmonitored entrances or smoking areas.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester identifies a side entrance used by employees on smoke breaks.

tasks.description: Attempt to tailgate an employee through the side entrance to bypass the badge reader.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully follows an employee inside without being challenged.

tasks.description: Locate an empty desk with an unlocked computer and plug in a malicious USB device to gain network access, achieving the test's objective.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully demonstrates a physical breach leading to a network compromise.
